channel.title: Ajax on No Code No Life
channel.description: Recent content in Ajax on No Code No Life

item.title: API串接方式
item.description: 以unsplash為範例 https://unsplash.com/ XMLHttpRequest() var url="https://api.unsplash.com/photos/?client_id=lcYNKXPrF1D5sa_ZlmEc3Wd4cRmigHF3X5OD9eDdCqY&page=11"; xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open('GET', url, true); xhr.onload = function() { if(this.status >= 200 && this.status < 400 ) {vm.photo = JSON.parse(this.responseText); console.log(vm.photo);} }; xhr.send(); xhr.onerror = function(){ return false }; code pen Alax $.ajax({ // type:"GET", url: url, // datatype:"text", // async: true, success: function(res){ vm.photo=JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(res)) } }); codepen codepen hahow
